page.title: 14HAM HOUSE STABLES
page.content: {Ham House Stables }is by {Ham {House.}The road it is in is called Ham Street. Ham House car park is just by it. They only teach 8 people because it is a livery stables. One of the lady's best colours out of the horses was black and chestnut. They had eight horses and three ponies. They teach in an arena which is about 120metres by 60metres. They have Arab,New Forest and Thoroughbred breeds. Jane's best horse is called Brig. Jane is one of the workers. Jane teaches at 3.45 and sometimes at weekends. Their smallest horse is called Nutmeg,she is a New Forest Pony. They start training race horses at 1 or 2 years old and they train ordinary horses at 3 or 4 years old. They range in price from Â£3,000 to Â£10,000.
